meanings.definition: Understatement in which an affirmative is expressed by the negative of the contrary.
meanings.sent3: I guess winning the lottery wouldn't be the worst thing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness knows no bounds, not.
meanings.sent5: The party was not lacking in excitement.

meanings.definition: A figure of speech consisting of an understatement in which an affirmative is expressed by negating its opposite.
meanings.sent1: It's not the end of the world.
meanings.sent2: The movie was not a total disaster.
meanings.sent3: Eating vegetables is not the worst punishment.
meanings.sent4: His speed on the track is not that of a snail.
meanings.sent5: The storm was not a gentle breeze.
